description:
With their first midterm exam approaching, Class D needs to find a way to improve their class average, or face another month with no points to spend. Even Horikita decides to take part, forming a study group to help the class underachievers. But can the stanoffish Horikita really inspire her classmates to succeed?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C’est une grande habileté que de savoir cacher son habileté.
It Takes a Great Talent and Skill to Conceal One`s Talent and Skill.
Sainou o Kakusu no ni mo Takuetsu Shita Sainou ga Iru.
لا بدّ من موهبةٍ ومهارةٍ كبيرة لإخفاء موهبة ومهارة المرء
才能を隠すのにも卓越した才能がいる.
재능을 숨기는 데에도 탁월한 재능이 필요하다
